title: League of Legends Stuck at Authenticating

replies.body: Getting stuck on authenticating is pretty clear sign that your network is having a difficult time talking to our login servers. Let's do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there. Refer to this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you need some help adjusting those settings, but do make sure to pay extra attention to the steps on port forwarding, firewalls, and how to flush your dns.
